overview: Two women, who are strangers, are standing at the ends of Brooklyn bridge at the crack of dawn. One moment, once they are passing each other, between them starts a recognition of loneliness in each others eyes. The movement becomes a dance which is as real as is life in the midst of the city that never sleeps.
tagline: Dance, Exchange, Arnolda Noir, Veraalba Santa, Kimberly Gair
title: Exchange
